viewsWelcome.affinidiDevTools:
Schemas allow you to build powerful workflows based on issued verifiable credentials.
[Create Schema](command:affinidiExplorer.createSchema)
Build a rule that checks validity of verifiable credentials against one or more schemas
[Create Rule](command:affinidiTools3)
Issue credentials for them to claim and add to their wallet
[Issue Credentials](command:affinidiDevTools.issueCredential)
